attributes.action: Make sick/ill people wear masks mandatory (depending on illness)
attributes.additional_details: We all know this is a difficult time for the government with demand for ppe but making this mandatory could be the key to preventing another pandemic, and keeping vulnerable people safer.
attributes.background: Make it mandatory for people to wear masks when stricken with a contagious illness or disease to prevent spread of infection.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to ask the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not exactly sure in what cases you want face masks to be mandatory. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you want the Government to extend requirements for self-isolation to people with symptoms of any virus, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/311623

If you want the government to make the wearing of masks in public mandatory, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304397
